abstract.t: This document describes LOWPAN_TCPHC, a scheme for compressing theheader of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments, in order toreduce the overhead on low-power and lossy networks. It alsospecifies the LOWPAN_TCPHC header fields for the transmission of TCPsegments over IPv6 for Low-power Wireless Personal Area Networks(6LoWPAN). In many cases, the 20 bytes of the mandatory TCP headercan be compressed into as little as 6 bytes.
